DOC.brief_title: A Study To Understand How The Body Reacts To A Low Dose Of PF‑06427878 When Given In A Vein To Healthy , Adult , Males
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male subject 1855 year age 2 . BMI 17.530.5 kg/m2 1 . History drug alcohol abuse within 2 year screen 2 . Subjects without suitable vein multiple venipuncture/cannulation
